content:
You can post feature request in the following forum: https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/idb-p/ideas/label-name/thunderbird%20android

There is the same feature request in the above forum already, and you can upvote it: Thunderbird Mobil: Show attachments above not below https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/thunderbird-mobil-show-attachments-above-not-below/idi-p/75073
creator: Yu5tiqX9og
